name: Ekaji Onah
headerTaglineThree: I build practical, scalable software products with a strong focus on clarity, performance, and real-world usability. I specialize in turning ideas into working systemsâ€”whether that's a SaaS product, a business tool, or an MVP ready for users.

services.title: Software Development
services.description: I design and build web and mobile applicationsâ€”from simple MVPs to more complex production systems. My work prioritizes maintainability, scalability, and business goals over unnecessary complexity.

services.title: API Development & Integration
services.description: I design and implement reliable APIs, primarily REST-based, and integrate third-party services such as payments, authentication, AI services, and data platforms to support modern applications.

services.title: Technical Writing & Documentation
services.description: I write clear, structured technical documentation, including API docs and product guides, that help teams, users, and stakeholders understand how systems work and how to use them effectively.

aboutpara: Over the course of my career, I've worked on a wide range of projectsâ€”spanning SaaS products, internal tools, AI-powered applications, and business websites. I'm comfortable working independently or within a team, and I place a strong emphasis on clear communication, especially when translating technical concepts for non-technical stakeholders. What motivates me most is building software that actually gets used. Whether it's streamlining workflows, improving accessibility, or solving practical business problems, I believe technology should be purposeful, simple where possible, and effective where it matters. I'm particularly interested in early-stage products, MVPs, and tools that help individuals and businesses operate more efficiently.
